featured.text: Worse yet, exposure to graphic violence and bloodshed can make them less sensitive to real-life violence and more accepting of aggression.
Unprepared for such a dangerous journey, many died of starvation and exposure to the cold weather.
Recent or repeated exposure to a song or even a small part of a song can also trigger earworms, as can word associations, such as a phrase similar to the lyrics of a song.

definition.zh_def: 暴露；接觸（某種情況或環境）
definition.en_def: The state of being exposed to contact with something.
definition.example: The exposure to sunlight can help improve your mood.
